headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Deluxo Special Vehicle Races Returning to GTA Online
content:
All vehicles are special, but some are certainly more special than others. It wouldn’t be fair to pit a landlocked import against a levitating sports-car, no matter how much time and money you’ve poured into customizations and mods.

Deluxo Special Vehicle Races solve this equation with tracks built to test specific abilities and strengths. To celebrate Deluxo Special Vehicle Races returning to GTA Online this week, racers competing will earn Triple Rewards.
